VFETribals.EraAdvancementDef.label: Form a tribe
VFETribals.EraAdvancementDef.description: Upon completing all pre-neolithic research projects, form a tribe. This will allow you to pick a Cornerstone - a powerful bonus that applies only to your civilization.
